title: Lounge, In Unit Washer & Dryer, Storage Units
map_address: 9100 W. Flamingo Rd. near Flamingo and El Capitan
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 38', 'OR Text', '38', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1055 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Find your escape at FireSkye, a fully modernized apartment community now leasing upscale 1, 2 and 3 bedroom residences.', 'Nestled in Spring Valley within sight of Red Rock Canyon, we invite you to experience a higher level of luxury with all-new amenity upgrades and reimagined social spaces to make you feel at home.', 'Soak up the sun by the pool, chill out in a private cabana, and live every day like you’re on vacation.', 'When it’s time to head back to your apartment, you’ll be greeted by thoughtfully designed living that instantly feels like your own personal oasis.', 'RENOS - COMING SOON!', 'Features:', 'Ice Maker, Heating, Range, High Speed Internet Access, Balcony, Air Conditioning, In Unit Washer & Dryer, Refrigerator, Eat-in Kitchen, Tile Floors, Microwave, Wi-Fi, Storage Units, Double Vanities, Fireplace, Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms), Kitchen, Walk-In Closets', 'Community Amenities:', 'Spa, Business Center, Pool, Cabana, Courtyard, Property Manager on Site, 24 Hour Availability, Grill, Fitness Center, Lounge', 'Pet Policy', 'One-time pet fee: $350', 'Pet deposit fee min: $150', 'Pet monthly rent min: $35', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'XEffUbQ6keVY']
